Articles.Content: Hello everyone I am Kyle a new member of this forum and I just wanted to say hello to all of you.

Hello Kyle, and welcome to the forums!

Greetings from western Canada.

Happy landings!

Hello!

I echo the above sentiment, except I'm from Kerbin-Mun L1.
Greetings! Be sure to check out the may great content providers over at Live from Mission Control!
Hello Kyle I am also new to the forum great to meet you and all the other members of this forum.

Hello davidhurley, and welcome to the forums!

I'm always pleased to meet and greet another new member.

Happy landings!
hello to both of you from HK!
